description.p: A doctor that almost died in the ancient ruins that once worshipped the abundance. The doctor gained the ability of immortality and great self healing. The doctor then delve into magic to learn and understand his own circumstances. After hundreds of years the doctor has learned a lot about their own ability that was the gift of the abundance. Well some people think it is a curse. The doctor still continues to practice and study in medicine making him the best doctor that will ever treat a patient.

ul.li: Equipment:A scroll case stuffed full of notes from your studies or prayers, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, an herbalism kit, and 5 gp
